press_button.description: Engage the button to start or stop printer operations.

slide_drawer.description: Slide the printer drawer out to add or remove papers.

slide_drawer_in.description: Slide the printer drawer in after adding or removing papers.

clean_printer_body.description: Wipe clean the printer body to maintain cleanliness.

clean_printer.description: Maintain the overall cleanliness of the printer.

load_paper_printer.description: Load papers into the printer for printing tasks.
